title: Modern Waikato Family Home
subtitle: Complete renovation bringing contemporary style to a 1970s home
description: A comprehensive transformation of a dated 1970s family home into a modern, energy-efficient living space. This project involved structural changes, kitchen and bathroom renovations, and landscaping to create a cohesive indoor-outdoor flow.
features: Open plan kitchen and living area

title: Contemporary Kitchen Renovation
subtitle: Stunning kitchen transformation with premium appliances
description: Complete kitchen renovation featuring premium appliances, stone benchtops, and custom cabinetry. The design maximizes storage while creating an entertainer's dream with a large island and seamless indoor-outdoor flow.

title: Luxury Master Bathroom Suite
subtitle: Spa-inspired bathroom with premium finishes
description: A luxurious master bathroom renovation featuring a freestanding bathtub, walk-in shower with rainfall head, and premium tile work. The design creates a spa-like retreat with excellent natural light and storage.

title: Sustainable Home Extension
subtitle: Eco-friendly addition doubling living space
description: A thoughtfully designed home extension that doubles the living space while maintaining the original character. Features sustainable materials, solar panels, and rainwater harvesting systems.

title: Commercial Office Fitout
subtitle: Modern workspace design for growing business
description: Professional office fitout creating a modern, collaborative workspace. Features include flexible meeting spaces, acoustic solutions, and biophilic design elements to enhance employee wellbeing.

title: Heritage Home Restoration
subtitle: Careful restoration preserving historical character
description: Sensitive restoration of a heritage villa, preserving original features while adding modern conveniences. The project required specialist heritage techniques and materials to maintain authenticity.
